(File photo) Ever since Covid-19 lost its grip globally in 2021, the auto industry bounced back at full throttle. The two-wheeler segment has reported an impressive sales post-pandemic in India. After seeing the growth in the segment, the maker started launching new products, giving more options to the customers, which somehow made them confused about their choices. To make it easy for all, who are planning to purchase a high-performance motorcyle and has budged under Rs 15 lakh. We have shortlisted top offerings from the market. These bikes come with dominating looks, have impressive performance, and offer a comfortable riding experience on multiple terrains. The list has been topped by the tech-loaded Triumph Tiger 900 GT. This piece of art comes at the starting price of Rs 3.95 lakh (ex-showroom, India), and has been offered in two variants – GT and Rally Pro. While the former has been introduced for city usage with decent off-road capabilities, the latter has been given some impressive cutting-edge technology, allowing the riders to enjoy a smooth riding expirence on any surface. The ADV cost 2 lakh extra, compared to the GT version. At the heart, the motorcyle is powered by a trusted 888cc engine, which generates a maximum of 106 bhp at 9500rpm and 90Nm at 6850rpm. Name it and this machine has it! Ducati Monster surely deserves the second position in the list, all thanks to its eye-pleasing naked design, performance and impressive exhaust note. The middle-weight street fighter has been released in the market with a price tag of Rs 12.95 lakh (ex-showroom, India). The Italian makers have used a 937cc L-twin engine in the motorcyle, which churns out a maximum output of 109 bhp at 9250rpm and a peak torque of 93Nm at 6500rpm. Suzuki’s most underrated offering Katana also made to the list for obvious reasons. It comes with an impressive road appearance, cutting-edge technology, agile performance, and an impressive braking setup. It has been given a K5 GSX-R1000-borrowed 999cc inline-four engine. The unit forces the machine to produce a whopping power of 149 bhp at 11,000rpm and 106Nm peak torque at 9000rpm. The model can be purchased at Rs 13.61 lakh (ex-showroom, India). Under the budget of Rs 15 lakh, the Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R also can be put on the priority list. It gets a 636cc inline-four engine with a maximum power of 127 bhp (With RAM Air) at 13,000rpm and peak torque of 69Nm at 11,000rpm. It comes with a top speed of 200kph, enough to make the path blurry with full throttle.

title: BMW CE 04 to Launch in India on July 24, Here's What We Know So Far - News18
article_content: Curated By : Shahrukh Shah News18.com Last Updated: June 23, 2024, 21:57 IST New Delhi, India BMW CE 04. (File photo) After taking the market by storm with fuel-powered engines in four-wheelers, the German carmaker BMW is set to rule the electric scooter segment. The company is all set to launch its much-awaited CE 04 on July 24. The company has already released an official invite regarding the same. Most of the elements are still under wraps such as price range and a few specifications details. However, some of the reports have removed a slight curtain from the suspense, giving an idea of what to expect from the model. It has been reported that the CE 04 might hit the Indian market with a price tag of Rs between Rs 10 lakh to 15 lakh (ex-showroom). This is just a speculation, a confirmed detail about the same will be cleared at the launch day tomorrow. Reports also suggested that the e-scooter might feature an impressive 8.9kWh battery setup, which will allow the customers to enjoy a decent range of 130km on a single charge. Reports also suggested that the motor can generate a maximum output of 31kW, and force CE 04 to do a 0-50 kmph sprint in just 2.6 seconds. It is expected to offer a top speed of 120kph. The vehicle will be equipped with a telescopic fork at the front, while the rear will have a mono-shock. The electric scooter will run on impressive alloy wheels. The model will get a single seating arrangement, featuring a barrier in between to separate the rider and rear passenger. The CE 04 will come with a long list of robust features. It includes multiple riding modes ABS, traction control, and Bluetooth-enabled TFT display, which will provide all the vehicle-related details to the rider such as charging capacity, range, speed, time, navigation and whatnot.

title: Bengaluru-Mysuru Road To Get Smart Traffic System From July 1 - News18
article_content: Curated By : Samreen Pall News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 09:15 IST Bengaluru, India Major roads in Mysuru are now equipped with ANPR cameras, installed at a cost of Rs 8.5 crore. (Representational Image) (Photo: Curly Tales) Starting July 1, the entire Bengaluru-Mysuru Road network will be equipped with the Intelligent Traffic Management System (ITMS), according to Alok Kumar, ADGP for Traffic and Road Safety in Karnataka. The ITMS, first launched in Bengaluru in December 2022, includes 250 automatic number plate recognition (ANPR) cameras and 80 red light violation detection (RLVD) cameras at 50 key junctions. This technology helps in detecting traffic violations and improving road safety. The ITMS has now expanded to Mysuru with ANPR cameras installed on major roads at a cost of Rs 8.5 crore. Mysuru city received Rs 4 crore, and the district region received Rs 4.5 crore. From July 1, traffic violators in Mysuru will start receiving challans. “The cameras will monitor several areas including Hunsur, HD Kote, Nanjangud, and T Narasipur. We have set up a Traffic Management Centre in Mysuru, and will soon start sending real-time SMS alerts to violators,” said Alok Kumar to Deccan Herald. The ADGP also plans to extend ITMS to four major highways connecting Bengaluru: Tumakuru Road (NH 4), Kanakapura Road (NH 948), Hosur Road (NH 44), and NH 75. These highways will also feature Variable Messaging Signs (VMS) to inform drivers about real-time traffic conditions and road events. More cameras and VMS boards are also planned for the Bengaluru-Mysuru highway. The state road transport authority has approved the proposal, and tenders will be issued in July. In a meeting on June 1, the state police’s traffic and road safety wing discussed integrating the challan system with FASTag at toll gates. This would enable direct deduction of traffic fines from the FASTag wallet. The ADGP plans to write to the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH) for approval. Alongside cameras, the police are investing in signboards, blinkers, 800 alcometers for checking drunk driving, and 155 laser speed guns to enhance road safety across Karnataka, excluding Bengaluru.

title: New Delhi Metro To Become Triple Interchange Hub With Green Line Extension - News18
article_content: Published By : Samreen Pall PTI Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 10:10 IST New Delhi, India Delhi Metro's Phase 4 expansion includes approximately 86 kilometers of new lines. (Representative Image) The New Delhi Metro station is all set to emerge as a triple interchange facility with the expansion of the Green Line from Inderlok to Indraprastha, officials said on Sunday. The 12.37 km long Inderlok – Indraprastha corridor will expand the already operational Brigadier Hoshiar Singh – Inderlok Green Line corridor (28.78 km), they said. On this new extension, the New Delhi station will be expanded as an interchange facility where three lines – Yellow, Orange (Airport Line), and now the Green Line will meet each other, the officials said. This will be a major connectivity boost for the entire city as now, commuters coming from Bahadurgarh as well as parts of west Delhi such as Nangloi, Rajdhani Park, Udyog Nagar etc. will be able to travel directly to the New Delhi railway station, adjacent to the New Delhi Metro station, they stated. This will make access to the New Delhi station more convenient and help decrease congestion near the station as more people will prefer to travel by metro than by road, they said. Like the existing New Delhi station, the new expansion for the Green Line shall also be underground. Presently, Kashmere Gate is the only triple interchange station on the Delhi Metro network where the Yellow, Red, and Violet lines meet. After Phase 4, three more stations, Lajpat Nagar, Azadpur and New Delhi will also emerge as triple interchange facilities, they said. Currently, about 86 kilometres of new lines are being constructed as part of the Delhi Metro’s Phase 4 expansion. Construction of three lines – Janakpuri West – RK Ashram Marg (Violet), Majlis Park – Maujpur (Pink) and Aerocity – Tughlakabad (Golden) is in progress right now, and over 50 per cent of civil work has been completed on these sections, the officials said. Two more corridors — Inderlok – Indraprastha and Saket G Block – Lajpat Nagar — have also received approval earlier this year. The DMRC at present, is processing for statutory clearances, including land taking over from DDA, CPWD and PWD and forest clearance requirements, they said. Further processes regarding planning and tendering for civil works are being done before further proceeding to specialised contracts for track laying, electrical systems, signalling and other technical components, the added.

title: Private Bus Operators Roll Out Shuttle Van Service Ahead of City Entry Deadline - News18
article_content: Curated By : Samreen Pall News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 12:03 IST Chennai, India This initiative is geared towards improving last-mile connectivity for commuters. (Photo: Deccan Herald) Private bus operators have rolled out shuttle van services from key locations like Vadapalani, Velachery, Pallavaram, and Sholinganallur to the new Kilambakkam bus terminus. This move comes in response to the upcoming deadline that will ban buses from entering city roads, aiming to improve last-mile connectivity for passengers. According to TOI, once the new parking lot is ready, all private buses will be prohibited from city roads. Explaining the decision, R Barathidasan, a private bus operator, said, “With the end of summer vacation and no upcoming festivals, fewer people are using private buses. To compete with the 1,600 buses going to destinations like Madurai and Coimbatore, we’re offering shuttle vans from main pick-up points at no extra cost. It takes about two hours to reach Kilambakkam due to traffic, so we’ve adjusted our bus schedules.” Passengers appreciate the new service. R Chidambaram, a frequent traveler, commented, “The shuttle vans are convenient for both departure and return to Chennai. Although the government says there are enough MTC buses from Kilambakkam to the city, we have to cross a busy highway and walk a kilometer to reach them. The shuttle vans drop us off at places like Tambaram, Kathipara, and Vadapalani, which is much easier.” The introduction of shuttle vans comes amid ongoing challenges with private buses not following boarding regulations. Despite orders from the Madras High Court, buses are still blocking traffic by boarding passengers at unauthorized spots. Residents hope this issue will be resolved when all bus operations move to Kilambakkam. Anbalagan, head of the TN All Omni Bus Owners and Operators Association, mentioned that the government promised parking for all registered buses at Kilambakkam, but currently, only 110 of the required 800 spots are available. CMDA officials said 80 percent of the work at Mudichur is complete, and operations will be moved soon.

title: BIS Rolls Out New Standards To Elevate Safety And Quality of Electric Vehicles - News18
article_content: Published By : Samreen Pall PTI Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 13:15 IST New Delhi, India A key focus of these standards is on fortifying the EV powertrain to meet rigorous safety protocols. (Representational Image) (Photo: Linkedin) The Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) has introduced two new standards to boost safety and quality of electric vehicles. In an official statement, the department of consumer affairs said BIS has come out with two new standards — IS 18590: 2024 and IS 18606: 2024. These standards are aimed at enhancing the safety of electric vehicles in the L, M, and N categories. “These standards focus on the critical component of electric vehicles ‘the powertrain’ ensuring it meets stringent safety requirements. Additionally, they emphasize the safety and performance of batteries, ensuring they are both powerful and secure,” the statement said. The department said the shift to electric mobility extends beyond cars and trucks. E-rickshaws and E-Karts are gaining popularity across India. “To address this, BIS has introduced IS 18294: 2023, which establishes safety standards specifically for these vehicles,” it said. These standards cover various aspects, from construction to functionality, ensuring the safety of both drivers and passengers. “With these new standards, BIS has raised the bar, now having a total of 30 Indian Standards dedicated to electric vehicles and their accessories, including charging systems,” the statement said. These standards are crucial in driving the transition to a more sustainable, environmentally friendly, and efficient transportation system in the country.

title: Kolkata Metro: Third Rail Replacement Work Begins in Oldest Corridor to Save Power - News18
article_content: Published By : Shahrukh Shah PTI Last Updated: June 15, 2024, 10:03 IST Kolkata, India Kolkata Metro. (Photo: Wikipedia) The Kolkata Metro has started replacing the steel third rails in its oldest corridor with the ones made of aluminium, which will ensure an 84 per cent reduction in energy consumption, officials said on Friday. The third rail system provides power to a train through a conductor kept alongside the rails, they said. “Once completed, Kolkata Metro will join Singapore, London, Moscow, Berlin, Munich and Istanbul where such replacement work of third rail has already been done and services are on smoothly,” an official said. The change shall ensure savings of Rs 1 crore per year per km, he said. The highly conductive aluminium third rail with stainless steel top will replace the existing steel-made third rail from Dum Dum station to Mahanayak Uttam Kumar station in Tollygunj in the North-South Line. The tender has been awarded to a Germany-based company and the work will be completed in two years, the official said. The aluminium third rails would reduce carbon emissions by 50,000 tons in its lifetime, he claimed. PTI SUS SOM .

title: BMW R 1300 GS: Here Are Top Reasons That Puts ADV Bike on Top Spot in Segment - News18
article_content: Written By : Shahrukh Shah News18.com Last Updated: June 16, 2024, 13:13 IST Delhi, India BMW R1300 GS. (Photo: Shahrukh Shah/News18) After ruling the ADV segment for years with R 1250 GS, the top player BMW Motorrad is now back with something bigger and better, the all-new R 1300 GS. The model has been released in India a few days back at the price tag of Rs 20.95 lakh (ex-showroom). The company has invested some good efforts in the model and made it a completely new motorcycle, overshadowing the previous version. All credit goes to new technology, powers, capabilities, riding quality, features, and whatnot. As they say, with great power comes great responsibility. This is the current scene with newly joined member family members as a brand has high hopes for the latest offering. Recently, the team CNN-News18 Auto has tested the newly added model in the fleet and put it ordeal on the world’s toughest terrain in Leh Ladakh. In this detailed article, we will try to pen down top pointers, mentioning why R 1300 GS could be the wise choice if looking for an ADV bike under the price range between Rs 20 to Rs 21 lakh. The company has some impressive enhancements at its heart. The motorcycle now uses a robust 1300cc engine. This unit is 6.5 kg lighter as compared to the 1250 GS, reducing the overall weight. It generates an extra 8 bhp and 5 Nm more torque, making it a total of 143 bhp and 149Nm, while the redline remains unchanged at 9,000 rpm. The newly designed engine feels punchy even at the highest altitudes around 17,000 feet above sea level. The exhaust note sounds quite aggressive as compared to the 1250 GS. If you are willing to invest a huge amount in a motorcycle, why settle for ugly looks? In terms of design, the company has mastered the art and made the newly launched R 1300 GS completely treat to the eyes. It comes with all the elements, which anyone could ask for. It has been treated with a dominating stance and appealing road appearance. The latest model has ditched the company’s signature style asymmetrical headlight design. Instead, it gets an LED matrix unit with 47 LEDs on board. It helps the riders to have an illuminated path, wherever the handle moves. The latest R 1300 GS has been built on a steel chassis with an aluminum subframe, cutting an extra kilogram from the overall weight. This makes it even more easy to ride on multiple terrain. To put an extra feather to its cap, the company has included a knuckle guard at both ends with integrated turned indicators. It offers a safe and secure riding experience to the customers. It might take the whole day to explain the list of features in R 1300 GS. Let’s cut it short and talk about only some cool ones. It gets an improved 6.5-inch TFT display, allowing the rider to monitor all the bike-related information such as gear positioning, riding model, speed, RPM, fuel efficiency, and whatnot. It also has height adjustment features (only in top models), an Adaptive cruise control model, ADAS, handle heating function, electrically adjustable front wisor, traction control, and suspension damping among others. Apart from this, customers also can enjoy electrically connected panniers with charging sockets inside. It helps the riders to charge all their gadgets while on the go. Despite having an overall weight of 237 kg, it is very easy to put it on the main stand, all thanks to the Jacking it function. Once the feature is engaged, it lifts the bike from the back itself and gets the job done without asking much effort. If you have ridden the 1250 GS, the updated avatar might leave you with an open mouth as it feels less heavy and more agile with extra comfort. All the credit goes to the over 12 kg weight deduction. The Telelever Evo suspension at the front makes a more rooted no matter if it is running on bumpy roads or rough patches. The 850 mm seat is big enough to accommodate riders comfortably, and won’t hurt the back during long journeys. We feel the latest R 1300 GS has been released to serve a purpose, catering to a specific target audience. If you are someone who loves to go on an adventure and likes to ride on extreme road conditions, then it surely deserves consideration under the price range between Rs 20 lakh to Rs 21 lakh (ex-showroom). From delivering fantastic performance on rough terrains to making you feel secure during off-road challenges, the newly launched R 1300 GS tasks all the responsibility effortlessly. It has been given all the capabilities to fight against all odds.

title: Nana Patekar Opens Up On His Elder Son’s Demise: ‘I Thought About What People Would Think’ - News18
article_content: Curated By : Akriti Anand News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 11:11 IST Mumbai, India Nana Patekar says he felt disgusted whenever he saw his son Nana Patekar is one of the most versatile actors in the industry. He has many times impressed fans with his acting skills. However, recently, Nana Patekar was seen opening up about his elder son’s demise and said that he never thought what his son Durvasa was feeling. To note, he died when he was two and a half years old. Talking to Lallantop, Nana Patekar said, “My eldest son was sick since birth. He had some complications. He had trouble in one eye, it wasn’t visible. I felt so disgusted that when I saw him, I thought about what people would think, what kind of son Nana has. I didn’t think about what he felt or how he felt. I only thought about what people would think about my son. His name was Durvasa. He spent two and a half years with us. But what can you do, some things happen in life.” However, he recently also talked about Tanushree Dutta who had accused him of sexual harassment. The actress claimed he misbehaved with her during the shoot of a song for the 2008 film Horn Ok Pleassss. Nana had denied the claims at the time. In a recent interview, Nana addressed the claims yet again and said he isn’t angry with turn of events. “I knew that it was all a lie. That’s why I didn’t get angry. When everything was a lie, why should I be angry? And all those things are old. They have happened. What can we talk about them? Everyone knew the truth. What could I say at that time when nothing like this happened? Suddenly, someone says that you did this, you did that. What would I have answered to all these things? Should I have said that I didn’t do this? I know the truth that I didn’t do anything,” Nana Patekar told The Lallantop. On the professional front, the actor was part of Vivek Agnihotri’s thought-provoking drama ‘The Vaccine War’ last year, where he delivered a compelling performance. Additionally, he graced the Marathi film industry with his presence in ‘Ole Aale’, a movie that resonated well with audiences and performed impressively at the box office.

title: Amitabh Bachchan Reveals He Is Scared of Kalki 2898 AD Star Prabhas' Sister: 'Told Her Mujhe Mat Maarna' - News18
article_content: Curated By : Dishya Sharma News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 11:47 IST Mumbai, India Amitabh Bachchan and Prabhas will be seen in Kalki 2898 AD. Amitabh Bachchan teased Prabhas by saying he is scared of his sister. The producers of Kalki 2898 AD revealed that Prabhas’ sister was one of the many assistant directors of the film. In a new video shared by the makers of the Telugu film, Prabhas confirmed that his sister is a part of Kalki 2898 AD. Amitabh then revealed that Prabhas introduced him to his sister and added that she would boss him around. Big B admitted he was taken aback by the confession and requested her not to hit him. “I know his sister was working with him. I was scared with her because one day, we were shooting with him. (He introduced) she’s my sister. (Prabhas said) when we were young, she used to boss me. After that, I told her ‘Mere ko mat maarna,'" Amitabh said. Kalki 2898 AD producers Priyanka Dutt and Swapna Dutt revealed director Nag Ashwin enjoys working with young film enthusiasts for it gives him different perspectives. Watch the interview below: In the chat, Amitabh also revealed he was mesmerised by Nag Ashwin’s vision for the film. “When Nagi came to talk to me about this, he just brought a picture, a visual of what my character is going to look like and what Prabhas is going to look like. And I was this huge guy who’s shoving off ‘THE’ Prabhas. And al the fans of Prabhas, please, you know, please excuse me. Main haath jod ke maafi maang rahe hai, don’t massacre me after you see what I do," Amitabh said. Amitabh continued, “That was so impressive. Very rarely do you see that.’" At a recent press conference held in Mumbai, Amitabh confessed he was taken aback with the concept of Kalki 2898 AD. “When Nag Ashwin came and explained his idea to me, for the long time after he left I was thinking, ‘what the hell is Nagi drinking?’" Amitabh said, leaving Rana and his other co-stars in splits. title: Ishq Vishk Rebound Box Office Day 3: Rohit Saraf, Jibraan Khan’s Film Earns Close Rs 4 Crores - News18
article_content: Curated By : Aditi Giri News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 11:54 IST Mumbai, India Rohit Saraf recently starred in Ishq Vishk Box Office Ishq Vishk Rebound, directed by Nipun Avinash Dharmadhikari and part of the Ishq Vishk franchise, is having a slow start at the box office. According to Sacnilk.com, the film earned Rs 1 crore net on its opening day in India. On Sunday, i.e day 3, the movie minted over Rs 1.40 crores. With this, the film’s total earnings stand at Rs 3.55 Crores. According to a report in Sacknilk, Ishq Vishk Rebound had an overall 17.69% Hindi Occupancy on Sunday, June 23, 2024. While the morning shows had 7.66% attendance, afternoon shows had 22.36%, evening shows had 25.40% and night shows had around 15.35%. News18 Showsha’s review of the film read, “The disappointing camera work bogs down the film’s viewing experience. But fortunately, the actors manage to hold our hands until the end. Ishq Vishk Rebound is out and out Rohit Saraf’s film. He is the narrator of the film. His character, Raghav, often breaks the fourth wall to talk to the audience and share his thoughts. The approach is heavily inspired from Phoebe Waller-Bridge’s Emmy-award winning show Fleabag. In India, Kader Khan had done it in the 1980s with Ghar Ho Toh Aisa.” Hrithik Roshan’s cousin Pashmina has made her acting debut in the film. At the trailer launch, producer Ramesh Taurani had revealed she had auditioned for the role and had not revealed her background until her family name popped up when she was signing the contract. In an interview with News18, Dharmadhikari said that though the role was tough to cast, when he found Pashmina, he knew she was a perfect fit. Pashmina was my only choice to play Samiya, nobody else came close. In that list of shortlisted names, there was only one name when it came to Samiya,” the filmmaker said. “I think Pashmina’s character was the toughest to cast, she plays a different character. Once you see the film you will understand. Her character walks a very thin line. But I think she got it absolutely right in her audition. Pashmina herself has a very enduring quality and that worked in her favour, especially when it came to casting Samiya.” The film marks the second film in the Ishq Vishk franchise and features four fresh faces — Pashmina Roshan, Jibraan Khan, Rohit Suresh Saraf and Naila Grrewal.

title: Salim Khan Shares Why Salman Khan Is Unmarried At 58 - News18
article_content: Curated By : Entertainment Bureau Local News Desk Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 12:08 IST Delhi, India Salim Khan said that Salman Khan easily enters into relationships. Salman Khan has been reigning supreme as one of the biggest stars of the Indian film industry for over 30 years now. While his fans are always eager to see him on screen, one question that lingers in the mind of every fan is ‘Why is the star still unmarried at 58’. Salman’s fans have been with him through thick and thin, during a rough patch of his career before 2009 and also when he was battling several lawsuits. His fans want nothing more than to see their favourite star get married but at 58, the possibilities of Salman getting married are quite bleak. So why has the actor eluded marriage? Salman’s father Salim Khan has an interesting take on the subject. A recent video is going the rounds on the internet where veteran screenwriter Salim Khan talked about how his son Salman views marriage and why he has not taken the marital plunge to date. Salim Khan said about Salman, “He easily enters into relationships, but he lacks the courage to get married. He has a very simple nature and gets attracted easily. However, he always wonders whether the woman can manage a family like his mother does.” Salim Khan said that Salman always looks for the qualities and traits that his mother has in the women he dates. A post shared by Miss Naziya. (@naziyapatel3) Salim Khan added, “He wants the woman he marries to be dedicated to her husband and children, just like his mother was. She should cook meals for the children, help them get ready and ensure their homework is done. title: Shabana Azmi Is Astonished By New Age Actors Entourage Cost, Recalls Having Three-Member Team - News18
article_content: Curated By : Akriti Anand News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 12:08 IST Mumbai, India Shabana Azmi recalls old days of working Shabana Azmi has recently expressed her astonishment at the entourage costs of new-age actors which has to be covered by producers. She shared her thoughts during a recent interview, providing a stark contrast between the past and present eras of Bollywood. Shabana Azmi mentioned that she used to have a three-member team and when it was a low-budget film there was no one. In an interview with Hindustan Times, Shabana Azmi said, “I find it astonishing that producers pick up these crazy tabs. In Hollywood, I have never seen anything like this except for personal trainers. The main dress designer, hairdresser and makeup artiste are all appointed by the producer’s team, [and no actor needs to bring their person staff].” Shabana Azmi said that when she was working in earlier days, she used to have a three-member team. “During the 1970s and 1980s, I only had a three-member team — a hair dresser, a make up artist, and the driver. In low budget films, we had nobody. At the most the unit makeup man and hair dresser,” shares the actor, adding that in case of projects with a limited budget, “I used my own clothes , used the unit’s hair and make-up person and always stayed in the same hotel as the unit,” the actress added. Recalling the old days, the actress mentioned that she used to travel in a bus with Smita Patil when shooting for Mandi. “I remember (late actor) Smita Patil and I had been given separate cars for the shooting of Mandi. In two days, we gave them up and travelled in the bus with all the actors because they were having so much fun while singing and playing silly games!” she recounts, sharing another anecdote where she bought her director an air ticket “when I realised he was travelling by train”. Recently, Anurag Kashyap blamed producers and agencies for actors’ unreasonable demands and surge in entourage cost. He said that the surge in cost was noted after the OTT uprising. He believes the cost rose after more agencies got involved in making a star a brand and as a result, stars and their entourage are paid more than the crew that actually sits down to make a film or a series.

During her performance, some anti-Taylor Swift fans were heard chanting derogatory slogans towards the pop star. Displeased by the crowd’s behaviour, Charli XCX took a stand for Taylor Swift by posting an elaborate write-up on her Instagram Stories. She simply asked the people to “stop” attacking an artist, asserting that she would not “tolerate” misconduct. “Can the people who do this please stop? Online or at my shows. According to a report by Deadline, a certain section of the audience was heard chanting, “A Taylor morreu” in Portuguese which translates to “Taylor is dead.” When a Swiftie demanded attention to the crowd’s “toxic behaviour”, it prompted Charli XCX to defend the name of her fellow pop singer. There have been rumours of bad blood between Taylor Swift and Charlie XCX. Not long ago Charli’s fans attacked Swift for releasing a UK-exclusive digital version of her popular album The Tortured Poets Department in the same week as Charli produced her latest album Brat. Fans speculated that the album clash posed a hindrance to Charli securing a top spot on the UK’s Official Charts, claimed Variety. That was not all on the supposed rivalry between the two singing sensations. Rumours also started swirling that one of the songs from the Brat album titled Sympathy is a Knife was Charli XCX’s indirect diss at Taylor Swift. Previously, Charli hinted at how the track was inspired by a woman who tapped her “insecurities”, reported Variety. The lyrics of the song also mention someone as “George”. Interestingly, Charli is engaged to drummer George Daniel, who is a member of the pop band The 1975, and Swift used to date the band’s lead singer Matty Healy. A post shared by Charli (@charli_xcx) Despite all the claims, Charli XCX has never commented negatively on Taylor Swift. She even gave a shoutout to the Blank Space singer in 2018 calling her “one of the biggest artists” of the present generation.

title: 'Used To Smoke 60 Cigarettes A Day When My Eldest Son Died': Nana Patekar - News18
article_content: Curated By : Entertainment Bureau Local News Desk Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 13:46 IST Delhi, India Nana Patekar was recently seen in the Marathi film Ole Aale. Veteran actor Nana Patekar recently opened up about his elder son’s demise. The actor, who rarely talks about his personal life, revealed those bitter truths related to his life, of which people are unaware. He said that he was addicted to smoking cigarettes. The actor spoke about his personal life in an interview with The Lallantop. He said that his eldest son battled health complications from birth. “He had trouble in one eye, it wasn’t visible. I felt so disgusted that when I saw him, I thought about what people would think, what kind of son Nana has. I didn’t think about what he felt or how he felt. I only thought about what people would think about my son,” he said. He added that he was shocked when his son died. He also said that he was so addicted to smoking that he used to smoke 60 cigarettes a day and also shared how he quit smoking. “At that time, I used to smoke about 60 cigarettes a day. I even smoked while bathing. But it’s a very bad thing. No one would sit in my car because of the foul smell. I never drank alcohol much but I smoked a lot,” the actor said. Nana Patekar further added that he quit smoking because of his sister. He said, “It was because of my sister that I quit smoking. She lost her only son. Then my sister saw me coughing after smoking. She said, ‘What else do you want to see?'” The actor was deeply hurt to hear this and he quit smoking from that day onwards. He also revealed how he met his wife. He shared that he named his elder son Durvasa. “His name was Durvasa. He spent two and a half years with us. But what can you do, some things happen in life,” he added. Nana Patekar is known for his witty humour and blunt statements. He has worked in several blockbuster films like Agnisakshi, Krantiveer and Tiranga. Last year, he was part of Vivek Agnihotri’s The Vaccine War.

title: Munjya Joins Rs 100 Crore Club: Abhay Verma, Sharvari Wagh's Film Earns Rs 7.2 Crores On Third Weekend - News18
article_content: Curated By : Aditi Giri News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 13:48 IST Mumbai, India Munjya Enters Rs 100 Crore Club Sharvari Wagh and Abhay Verma starrer ‘Munjya’ hit theatres on June 7 and impressed everyone. The film has been earning rave reviews from fans and critics alike, and has been minting huge numbers at the box office too. The film has now grossed over Rs 100 crores at the ticket window. On Day 17, the film earned over Rs 7.2 crores. The official update from the production house shared the numbers and wrote, “Munjya laughs and scares its way to 100 Cr! Thank you for the historic third weekend. We couldn’t have done it without you! ❤️ Book your tickets now.” A post shared by Maddock Films (@maddockfilms) According to a report in Sacknilk, Munjya had an overall 33.01% Hindi Occupancy on Sunday, June 23, 2024. While the morning shows had an occupancy of 17.24% per cent, it increased to over 39.61 percent and 48.39 percent, respectively, during the afternoon and evening shows. Munjya is a horror-comedy which is based in Pune and the Konkan region. Besides Sharvari and Abhay, the film also stars Mona Singh in a key role. It follows the story of the eponymous mythical creature who wreaks havoc in the life of Bittu, played by Abhay. The film gained majorly positive reviews. News18 Showsha gave Munjya a 3-star rating. “Munjya beautifully draws inspiration by blending elements of horror and cultural depth to weave a story that is both enthralling and deeply rooted in Indian mythology. The movie delivers a good cinematic experience owing to its good writing and the gripping folklore. It is a clean entertainer. It has family-friendly written all over it and has all the elements of a typical commercial horror comedy. This is a must-watch for anyone interested in folklore and horror storytelling,” a part of our review reads.

title: Sarfira First Song Maar Udi Out: Akshay Kumar Defies All Odd To Achieve His Goal In This Track - News18
article_content: Curated By : Akriti Anand News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 13:48 IST Mumbai, India Sarfira First Song Maar Udi Out Akshay Kumar is all set to impress the audience with his performance in the upcoming film Sarfira . The trailer was released recently and has been praised by all. The film is the Hindi remake of Suriya’s Soorarai Pottru, which is said to be the biopic of G. R. Gopinath, the founder of the Indian low-cost airline Simplifly Deccan. Today, the first song Maar Udi was released. Taking to his Instagram handle, Akshay Kumar shared a video where he is seen fighting all odds to achieve all his goals. Sung by the powerhouse quartet of Yadu Krishnan, Sugandh Shekar, Haston Rodrigues, and Abhijith Rao, and penned by Manoj Muntashir Shukla, ‘Maar Udi’ embodies the spirit of resilience and courage. Directed by Sudha Kongara, ‘Sarfira’ is a gripping narrative that delves into the world of start-ups and aviation. Watch the song here: A post shared by TimesMusic (@timesmusichub) The film takes us through the life of a common man as he navigates the business world by starting a low-cost aviation company. As per the trailer, the film will be a story of a common man’s determination against monetary and societal barriers. Akshay Kumar says in the trailer, “Main aam aadmi ke liye cost nahi, caste barrier bhi todna chahta hoon.” A few days ago, a video leaked online showing Akshay and Radhika shooting a dance sequence. In the leaked footage, Akshay Kumar can be seen on a terrace with Radhika Madan and two other people. Soon, they all break into a dance sequence on the terrace. Akshay Kumar’s film will be released on July 12. The film’s first poster was also dropped last week. Taran Adarsh took to his Instagram handle and shared the poster. “AKSHAY KUMAR: ‘SARFIRA’ FIRST POSTER UNVEILS… 12 JULY RELEASE… #Sarfira – which marks #AkshayKumar – director #SudhaKongara’s first collaboration – arrives in *cinemas* on 12 July 2024. #Sarfira also features #PareshRawal, #RadhikkaMadan and #SeemaBiswas. Produced by Aruna Bhatia [Cape Of Good Films], Suriya and Jyotika [2D Entertainment] and Vikram Malhotra [Abundantia Entertainment]… Music by GV Prakash Kumar,” read the caption. The original 2020 Tamil drama film was directed by Sudha Kongara and produced by Suriya and Guneet Monga, under their respective banners 2D Entertainment and Sikhya Entertainment. The story was conceptualised and written by Kongara. The film starred Suriya, Aparna Balamurali, and Paresh Rawal, with Mohan Babu, Urvashi, and Karunas amongst others in supporting roles.

title: Rajkumar Hirani DENIES Casting Shah Rukh Khan And Samantha Ruth Prabhu In A Film, Calls It Baseless - News18
article_content: Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 13:57 IST Mumbai, India A source close to Rajkumar Rao has broken silence over the film. Shah Rukh Khan is back on top with three big hits in 2023: Pathaan, Jawan, and Dunki. Rajkumar Hirani’s film did well, but expectations were even higher. Now, there were rumors they might team up again with Samantha Prabhu. Could this be their big comeback? On Saturday, rumours started that Shah Rukh Khan and Rajkumar Hirani are planning an action-adventure-patriotic film together. Fans are excited, especially with SRK’s recent successes. Adding Samantha Prabhu to the mix had made everyone even more excited, imagining a huge hit in both Southern and Northern markets. And now, sources close to Rajkumar Hirani strongly deny the rumours, stating that Raju Sir is currently busy writing his next film. There have been no discussions with SRK or Samantha regarding any project. The source laughs off the idea of Shah Rukh Khan and Samantha collaborating for an untitled action-adventure patriotic movie as completely baseless and untrue. According to Koimoi, Rajkumar Hirani had high hopes for Dunki to be a major box office hit. Although it did well and earned 232 crores, it didn’t meet huge expectations. Rajkumar Hirani is still reflecting on Dunki’s performance and is taking time to decide on his next project. While working with Shah Rukh Khan is appealing, Hirani is searching for the perfect story. Nothing has been finalised yet. On the professional front, SRK’s next film is King, starring alongside his daughter Suhana Khan. Directed by Sujoy Ghosh, not much is known about the project, but a viral look of SRK in a new avatar has created excitement. While Suhana debuted with The Archies, King will be her first big-screen film. SRK also has Tiger vs Pathaan and a Pathaan sequel coming up. Samantha Ruth Prabhu will be seen in ‘Citadel’ with Varun Dhawan and is also working on her Telugu films. Rajkumar Hirani has created several blockbusters, such as 3 Idiots, PK, Sanju, and Munnabhai MBBS.

title: Kamal Haasan Reveals REAL Reason For Taking A Year To Sign Prabhas' Kalki 2898 AD: 'Self-Doubt Comes...' - News18
article_content: Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 13:59 IST Mumbai, India Kamal plays Yaskin in Kalki 2898 AD. title: When Kamal Haasan Worked As A Dance Assistant To Prabhas' Uncle - News18
article_content: Published By : Dishya Sharma Trending Desk Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 14:01 IST Mumbai, India Kalki 2898 AD will open to theatres on June 27. (Photo: Instagram) Kalki 2898 AD is currently the most awaited film of the year. It features Amitabh Bachchan, Kamal Haasan, Prabhas and Deepika Padukone in lead roles. Following the release of the intriguing trailer recently, the cast, along with producers Swapna Dutt and Priyanka Dutt, sat for an interview and shared details about the film. During the conversation, Haasan surprised everyone by revealing his personal connection with Prabhas’ family. Kamal Haasan reminisced his time when he worked as a dance assistant for Prabhas’ late uncle, Krishnam Raju, and shared a humorous incident from those days. After confirming that the Baahubali star is a second generation artist from his family, Haasan said, “I was a dance assistant. He [Krishnam Raju] was not much of a dancer, he used to say, don’t give me this moment. He used to threaten me, take me aside during breakfast." During the interview, Kamal Haasan, who will play the villain Supreme Yaskin in Kalki 2898 AD, revealed what he loved the most about working on the film. He mentioned that it wasn’t about the number of cameras or the crew size, but he appreciated the peaceful atmosphere of the set. Haasan pointed out that calmness is often absent on many sets, which become a distraction. He highlighted that the noise should come from within a person or heard in theatres. “Everybody is talking in discipline. I found that Mr. Nagi (Nag Ashwin) could speak in his volume and still be heard. Nagi mumbles, but he is still heard in the set because that’s how quiet the set is," Kamal Haasan added. Meanwhile, the newly released trailer of Kalki 2898 AD begins with Amitabh Bachchan’s Ashwathama talking to Deepika Padukone’s character. He says that Deepika is carrying god in her womb. Shortly after, the trailer features intense fight scenes between Prabhas and Big B. The trailer then cuts to Kamal Haasan, followed by multiple intriguing scenes that promise an engaging cinematic experience. Directed by Nag Ashwin, Kalki 2898 AD also features Disha Patani, Rajendra Prasad, Pasupathy, Saswata Chatterjee, Anna Ben and Chemban Vinod Jose. The movie is scheduled to release on June 27 in Tamil, Telugu, Hindi, Malayalam and Kannada.

title: Ulajh: Janhvi Kapoor, Gulshan Devaiah, Roshan Mathew's Patrotic Film To Release On August 2 - News18

The film also stars Rajesh Tailang, Meiyang Chang, Sachin Khedekar, Rajendra Gupta and Jitendra Joshi in pivotal roles.

title: Inside Out 2 Sets New Record With Best Second Weekend For An Animated Film - News18
article_content: Curated By : Dishya Sharma Trending Desk Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 14:19 IST Mumbai, India Inside Out 2 brings the story of Riley, a teenager in her high school. (Photo Credit: YouTube) After two weeks of release, Disney and Pixar’s Inside Out 2 continues to rage above the rest as the highest-grossing movie of the year. In its second weekend, the animated flick grossed a record-breaking $100 billion domestically along with over $164.4 million overseas to finish Sunday with more than $700 million in ticket sales. According to a Variety report, Inside Out 2 saw a slight decline of 35 per cent from its magnanimous debut, making it the best ever for an animated film. Not just that, this also marks the 7th best second weekend ever, crossing biggies like Force Awakens, Avengers: Endgame, Avengers: Infinity War, Black Panther, Jurassic World, and The Avengers. With more than $700 million at the box office, the Pixar sequel has already beaten Dune: Part Two, which generated $711 million globally. The film now inches towards the $1 billion benchmark. Additionally, Inside Out 2 brings more to the second weekend than its 2015 predecessor, which earned $90 million in the opening weekend. According to The Hollywood Reporter, its tally stands at $355 in North America, while it has raked in another $369.4 overseas, totalling approximately $724 million worldwide. With such impressive collections, the film clearly marks a win for both Disney and Pixar. While the last two Pixar releases, Elemental and Lightyear, saw mediocre sales, three prior films were directly sent to streaming platforms due to COVID-19. The film’s performance also shows a rebound for theatres, considering very few films had a good show this year. More On Inside Out 2 A direct sequel to 2015’s Inside Out, the second installment follows a teenage Riley and her newfound emotions of Anxiety, Embarrassment, Envy, and Ennui. Besides, her OG five emotions—Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear and Disgust—also make a return to the film. Directed by Kelsey Mann, Inside Out 2 begins where the first part ended. The story picks up with Riley, now a teenager, who is about to go to ice skating camp, only to come across various challenges while navigating high school life and making new friends. Disney-Pixar seems to have done a commendable job by combining the extraordinary adventures with a relatable and mature coming-of-age tale. “The new characters promise to stir things up within headquarters," says Mann.

title: Gentle Cleanser To Vitamin C Serum, A Look At Actress Triptii Dimri’s Skincare Routine - News18
article_content: Curated By : Entertainment Bureau Local News Desk Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 14:22 IST Bengaluru, India Triptii Dimri shared the products she uses for her skin. People are often eager to know the beauty secrets of actresses. Fans wonder what these famous celebrities use to look pretty. Celebs often share their skincare routine and makeup hacks with fans. In one such interview last year, actress Triptii Dimri shared her beauty secrets. Triptii Dimri earned massive fame after her recent film Animal dominated the box office. She was highly praised for her role in the film. Many of her fans often wonder what’s the secret behind her glowing skin. Triptii Dimri mentioned in the interview that she has sensitive skin, which is the reason she uses gentle products with less chemical content. She said, “I have a super simple skincare routine. I wash my face with a gentle cleanser. I cannot use anything too harsh because my skin is overly sensitive and immediately reacts to such products that have high chemical contents. Then for moisturiser, I use the Clinique Moisture Surge. it is very light and perfectly works for my type of skin.” Triptii further mentioned that she uses a Vitamin C serum every alternate day. She applied the serum before applying the moisturiser. The actress also added that she uses sunscreen even when she is at home where there is no sunlight. She also advised her fans to do the same in order to keep their skin healthy. She said, “I use SPF even when I am at home and I have no plan to step out of my house. I use it even on rainy days when there is no sunlight. I feel that this habit helps my skin to heal and glow. I feel that everyone should use it in their daily life.” Talking about her nighttime skincare routine, Triptii said, “At Night I follow the same skincare routine. At first, I wash my skin with the same cleanser and then I apply a slightly heavier moisturiser as I help my skin to remain soft. Then I apply Retinol serum every alternate day.”

title: Bride Sonakshi Sinha Gets Emotional During Her Entry; Brothers Kussh and Luv Sinha Skip Wedding? - News18
article_content: Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: June 23, 2024, 21:47 IST Mumbai, India Sonakshi Sinha and Zaheer Iqbal are now married. A new video from Sonakshi Sinha’s wedding is going viral on social media. The heartwarming footage shows Sonakshi walking beneath a traditional ‘phoolon ka chaddar’, a canopy of flowers held up by her friends and actor Saqib Saleem, who is like a brother figure in her life. In the video, Sonakshi visibly becomes emotional as she walks up to her soulmate, Zaheer, on the big day. For those unversed, Phoolon ka chaddar in a Punjabi wedding refers to a canopy made of flowers that is held over the bride’s head as she makes her entrance. It is a traditional and symbolic element of the wedding procession, often accompanied by music and dancing, signifying the bride’s arrival and her special status on her wedding day. This canopy of flowers adds to the grandeur and auspiciousness of the occasion in Punjabi weddings. It is typically carried by female relatives or friends of the bride or brothers. Her brothers were also spotted earlier in the evening as they made their way to the venue. Check out Sonakshi’s video here: A post shared by F I L M Y G Y A N (@filmygyan) Actress Sonakshi Sinha’s family members, including her mother Poonam Sinha and brother Luv Sinha, had sparked concern ahead of her wedding with Zaheer Iqbal, following a viral post on Reddit claiming that the duo didn’t follow the ‘Heeramandi’ star on Instagram. Sonakshi had come under intense scrutiny ever since an audio invite of her wedding with Zaheer surfaced on the internet. Rumors were also circulating that her father, actor-turned-politician Shatrughan Sinha, was allegedly upset with her for not informing him about her wedding plans. Earlier, Luv Sinha had reacted to the reports of her sister’s wedding to Zaheer Iqbal in a conversation with ETimes. Luv, who is reportedly out of the city, chose to remain tight-lipped about the matter. He told ETimes, “I’m out of Mumbai at the moment, and if it’s regarding the news published, I have no comment or involvement in the matter.”

title: Vijay Mallya Beams With Joy at Son Siddharth Mallya's Wedding, Poses With Daughter in Law | See Pics - News18
article_content: Curated By : Dishya Sharma News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 07:57 IST Mumbai, India Vijay Mallya attends Siddharth Mallya's wedding. Siddharth Mallya got married over the weekend and Vijay Mallya ensured he didn’t miss it. In photos surfacing online, the fugitive businessman joined his close family members and friends to celebrate Siddharth’s wedding with Jasmine. In one of the photos, Vijay posed with Sid and his wife. The family sported big smiles as they posed for the cameras. Photos and videos have also revealed that Sid and Jasmine hosted two wedding ceremonies. While Sid suited up for a Christian-style wedding, in which his wife Jasmine wore a gorgeous white gown, Sid and Jasmine also performed a Hindu-style wedding ceremony. Check out a few photos below: Liquor tycoon’s son Sidharth Mallya gets married with fanfare today in London pic.twitter.com/tkgSiOCsGG — Harsh Goenka (@hvgoenka) June 23, 2024 A post shared by BollywoodShaadis.com (@bollywoodshaadis) The wedding reportedly took place at Vijay Mallya’s $14 million estate in Hertfordshire. Vijay purchased the estate just a few months after he fled from India in 2016. The Kingfisher Airlines promoter has been accused of money laundering. He also owes an Indian bank Rs 9,000 crore connect to the downfall of his airline in 2012. Meanwhile, Siddharth, who once dated Deepika Padukone, took to his Instagram account and confirmed he is a married man now. Sharing two pictures from his Christian-style wedding, Sid Mallya wrote, “MR & Mrs Muppet #justmarried #wedding.” A post shared by Sid (@sidmallya) Jasmine also took to her Instagram Stories and shared the first photo. In the photo, Jasmine was seen wearing a white gown while Siddharth opted for a crisp suit. The couple appeared to have an outdoor wedding. Jasmine also gave fans a close look of their wedding ring. She shared a picture of their hands along with the caption, “Forever.” The wedding festivities kicked off with Siddharth sharing a glimpse of the wedding party on Instagram. “Wedding week has commenced….❤️ #wedding #ily,” Siddharth wrote while sharing a picture with his bride-to-be. In the photo, the soon-to-be-wedded couple was seen posing behind a gorgeous rose installation. Sidhartha was seen wearing a white tuxedo with a pair of pink pants while Jasmine opted for a floral dress. The installation looked like a photo frame, giving the picture a beautiful spin. Siddharth proposed to Jasmine in 2023. He popped the question on Halloween. In the photos shared on the occasion, Siddharth was seen dressed as a Halloween pumpkin whereas Jasmine sported a witch costume. Jasmine flaunted her engagement ring in the photo.

title: Sharmin Segal Makes First Public Appearance With Husband Aman Mehta Since Heeramandi Release - News18
article_content: Curated By : Aditi Giri News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 08:06 IST Mumbai, India Sharmin Segal, Aman Mehta arrive for Sonakshi Sinha's wedding reception. Photo: Viral Bhayani Sharmin Segal recently made her first appearance since the release of her debut web series Heeramandi. She arrived for her co-star Sonakshi Sinha’s wedding reception in Mumbai and was joined by her husband Aman Mehta. Sharmin looked pretty in a pristine white saree, teamed with a golden blouse. Aman on the other hand donned a maroon kurta. The couple donned their brightest smiles as the shutterbugs captured them. Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s web series Heeramandi was released on Netflix earlier this month. It soon became a talking point among audiences for its historical inaccuracies and casting choices. Sanjay Leela Bhansali and his niece, Sharmin Segal, who essays the role of Alamzeb in the series, especially bore the brunt of heavy critique by the viewers. Sharmin was recently asked if Sanjay Leela Bhansali gave her any leeway as she is his niece. Sharmin told The Indian Express, “Ulta, I don’t get any leeways. He loves me a lot, I’m not going to deny that. There are days when he’ll look at me like ‘Sharmin, his niece’ when I’m just sitting. When I look at him on a set, I don’t look at him as my uncle. I look at him as Sanjay Leela Bhansali and that’s the respect he has earned throughout his life. I can’t take that away just because I’m related to him. I also can’t change the fact that I’m related to him.” Sharmin said that when she turned 18, she rewatched Devdas and realised that “Sanjay Leela Bhansali is my mama”. She said, “I understood who the man was and my respect for him skyrocketed when I had the maturity to understand his work… Then I worked with him as an assistant and realised how much hard work he puts in. Then I worked with him as an actor and realised the genius that he is… We call him Sanjay sir, me and my sister both. Never in public do we ever call him mama.” Sharmin Segal is the daughter of Bella Bhansali Segal (Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s sister) and Deepak Segal. She plays the role of Alamzeb in the show, which boasts an ensemble cast of acclaimed actors like Manisha Koirala, Sonakshi Sinha, Richa Chadha, Shekhar Suman, Aditi Rao Hydari, Fardeen Khan and Adhyayan Suman among others. While Manisha, Sonakshi and Aditi have been getting much love and appreciation for their solid performances, Sharmin has been receiving a huge backlash for “holding the same expression” throughout the show.

title: Aditi Rao Hydari Kisses Rekha, Siddharth Falls on Her Feet at Sonakshi Sinha's Wedding Bash; Watch - News18
article_content: Curated By : Dishya Sharma News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 08:41 IST Mumbai, India Rekha, Aditi Rao Hydari and Siddharth at Sonakshi Sinha wedding reception. (Pic: Viral Bhayani) Bollywood veteran actress Rekha joined soon-to-wed couple Aditi Rao Hydari and Siddharth at Sonakshi Sinha and Zaheer Iqbal’s wedding reception in Mumbai on Sunday night. The couple coincidentally made their entry to the bash with Rekha and ended up posing with her for photos. Rekha made a dazzling entry on the red carpet and shared the frame with the couple. As soon as Siddharth spotted Rekha, he fell on her feet and got her blessings. The trio then smiled wide for the cameras. Another video also showed the couple escorting her out of the bash. Rekha was seen bidding goodbye to Aditi and Sid when Aditi planted a kiss on Rekha’s cheek. Rekha also appeared to be teasing the couple. Watch the videos below: A post shared by Viral Bhayani (@viralbhayani) A post shared by Snehkumar Zala (@snehzala) Sonakshi Sinha and Zaheer Iqbal got married on Sunday, June 23. They held a civil marriage ceremony. Sonakshi revealed they chose to marry on June 23 because seven years ago, on the same day, they started dating. Sharing the photos from their civil marriage ceremony, Sonakshi wrote, “On this very day, seven years back (23.06.2017) in each others eyes, we saw love in its purest form and decided to hold on to it.” “Today that love has guided us through all the challenges and triumphs… leading up to this moment… where with the blessings of both our families and both our gods… we are now man and wife. Here’s to love, hope and all things beautiful with each other, from now until forever ❤️ Sonakshi ♾️ Zaheer 23.06.2024,” she added. Meanwhile, Aditi and Sid are also expected to tie the knot soon. Aditi Rao Hydari and Siddharth’s love story is not secret. Their romance blossomed during the filming of the 2021 movie Maha Samudram. Since then, they have been together. In March this year, reports of their secret wedding made headlines after Great Andhra claimed that the two took wedding vows at the Sri Ranganayakaswamy temple in Srirangapuram, Wanaparthy District, Telangana. However, later, Aditi revealed that they are not married but engaged. On March 28, 2024, she dropped an engagement photo with Siddharth. In the picture, they held each other close as Aditi flaunted a diamond ring whereas Siddharth sported a gold band on his ring finger with magenta detailing. Captioning the photo, Aditi wrote, “He said yes! E. N. G. A. G. E. D.” Siddharth also addressed secret marriage rumours during an event and clarified, “Many told me we had done this (get engaged) in secret. There’s a big difference between doing something privately with family and in secret.”

title: Shatrughan Sinha REACTS for 1st Time to Sonakshi Sinha's Wedding: '44 Years Ago, I Married a Very...' - News18
article_content: Curated By : Shrishti Negi News18.com Last Updated: June 24, 2024, 05:07 IST Mumbai, India Shatrughan Sinha and wife Poonam Sinha pose at their daughter Sonakshi Sinha's wedding reception. Bollywood actress Sonakshi Sinha married longtime boyfriend Zaheer Iqbal in a private ceremony at her Bandra apartment in Mumbai on Sunday. After the civil marriage, the newlyweds hosted a grand reception at Bastian, Dadar. The actress has been facing immense trolling for her inter-faith marriage with Zaheer. The newlyweds have even switched off comments on their wedding photos on Instagram to avoid unwarranted hate during their special occasion. Amid all this, Sonakshi’s dad and actor-turned-politician, Shatrughan Sinha, has reacted to her civil marriage. When asked how he was feeling on the day of his daughter’s wedding, Shatrughan told Times Now, “Yeh bhi koi poochne ki baat hai? Every father waits for this moment when his daughter is given to her chosen groom. My daughter looks most happy with Zaheer. Unki jodi salamat rahe,” he said Shatrughan continued, “44 years ago, Shatrughan Sinha married a very successful, very beautiful, very talented girl of his choice, Poonam Sinha. Now it is Sonakshi’s turn to marry the boy of her choice.” Sharing photos from their low-key wedding ceremony, the newlyweds wrote on Instagram, “On this very day, seven years back (23.06.2017) in each others eyes, we saw love in its purest form and decided to hold on to it. Today that love has guided us through all the challenges and triumphs… leading up to this moment… where with the blessings of both our families and both our gods… we are now man and wife. Here’s to love, hope and all things beautiful with each other, from now until forever. Sonakshi ♾️ Zaheer 23.06.2024.” A post shared by Sonakshi Sinha (@aslisona) Sonakshi and Zaheer dated for seven years before taking their relationship to the next level. While they got hitched in an intimate ceremony, the couple hosted a grand reception for their friends from the film industry.
